repliclust.utils.radius_from_log_volume¶

repliclust.utils.radius_from_log_volume(log_volume: float, dim: int)¶

Compute radius corresponding to a sphere of given log volume in the given number of dimensions.

log_volumefloat

The natural log volume of the sphere’s volume.

dimint

The number of dimensions.

outfloat

The radius of the sphere.

repliclust
